name: Planting Poetry
description:
Submission for My First Game Jam Summer 2022.
Theme: "Heal"

A short Twine game about reading poetry to your houseplant (a stromanthe triostar), starting anew, and healing from a broken heart. Somewhat based on my own personal experiences.

Three endings!
Featuring poems by Sappho, Li Qingzhao, Mary Oliver, Wang Xiaoni, Emily Dickinson, and maybe...you?

Planned updates:
- Background image changes depending on your choices and the passage of time.
- Adding music and sounds.
- Being able to restart the game when you've reached an ending without exiting.
